md.html:
That which is necessary for optimal psychological functioning of the brain.

  • Relationships
  • Meaning
  • Positive emotion
  • Self-esteem
  • Security
  • Resilience
  • Leisure

Potential addition:

  • Intimacy (affection, attention)
  • Autonomy (agency, self-sufficiency)

fm.title: Psychological needs
fm.description: Psychological needs outline that which is necessary for for optimal psychological functioning of the brain.
fm.keywords: psychological, needs, human, healthy, neglect, fulfillment, effects
